name: SupaHot
0:
”Alexa, ask Supa Hot what rhymes with car”
”think of the next line for this, I'm looking for a new car”
”drop a verse about cars”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: supa hot
des:
Supa Hot helps you stay at the top of your rap game. Ask for a rhyme for a word, the next line to your song, or a complete verse!

You can ask Supa Hot for a rhyme for any word you need. Likewise, you can also tell Supa Hot your rap so far and it will help you think of the next line! 

Supa Hot can also drop a verse all by itself - you can ask it to rap about anything you want!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
